# dokploy_bitbucket_provider (Resource)

Manages a Bitbucket provider integration in Dokploy.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `auth_id` (String) The authentication ID (usually user ID from Dokploy).
- `name` (String) The name of the Bitbucket provider.

### Optional

- `api_token` (String, Sensitive) The Bitbucket API token.
- `app_password` (String, Sensitive) The Bitbucket app password for authentication.
- `bitbucket_email` (String) The Bitbucket email address.
- `bitbucket_username` (String) The Bitbucket username.
- `bitbucket_workspace_name` (String) The Bitbucket workspace name.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp.
- `git_provider_id` (String) The git provider ID used for deletion.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the Bitbucket provider (bitbucketId).
- `organization_id` (String) The Dokploy organization ID.
